mapper.select: select carrier_manage_id, transportation_task_id, carrier_id, carrier_manage_price, pay_status from carrier_manage where carrier_manage_id = #{carrierManageId}
mapper.insert: insert into carrier_manage(transportation_task_id, carrier_id, carrier_manage_price, pay_status) values (#{transportationTaskId}, #{carrierId}, #{carrierManagePrice}, #{payStatus})

insert into carrier_manage(transportation_task_id, carrier_id, carrier_manage_price, pay_status) values
(#{entity.transportationTaskId}, #{entity.carrierId}, #{entity.carrierManagePrice}, #{entity.payStatus})

insert into carrier_manage(transportation_task_id, carrier_id, carrier_manage_price, pay_status) values
(#{entity.transportationTaskId}, #{entity.carrierId}, #{entity.carrierManagePrice}, #{entity.payStatus})
on duplicate key update transportation_task_id = values(transportation_task_id), carrier_id = values(carrier_id), carrier_manage_price = values(carrier_manage_price), pay_status = values(pay_status)
mapper.update:
update carrier_manage
transportation_task_id = #{transportationTaskId},
carrier_id = #{carrierId},
carrier_manage_price = #{carrierManagePrice},
pay_status = #{payStatus},
where carrier_manage_id = #{carrierManageId}
